Ken, I am really sorry for sitting on this for so long. I tried hard to convince myself that change is ok - but I am sorry, I don't think this particular change is worth it.

In theory, with this change, it is possible for a thread to be stuck in cq-next for a long time and when such a thing happens, it will be very hard to debug the issue (since the symptom would be long latencies for some requests - happening intermittently / in a non-deterministic fashion).

I am actually all up for exploring the option to remove executor altogether - or make it an optional thing. However, starting that effort (to remove executor) with this code path makes me very uncomfortable.
